channel.title: Daily Express :: World Feed
channel.description: Simply The Best 7 Days A Week

item.title: The bleak little island so close to the North Pole only 9 people live there
item.description: Despite being isolated, the incredible island can still be visited by tourists.
item.author: Holly Kintuka
item.media:keywords: Norway, Tourism, Cold weather, Bear Island, Svalbard archipelago, meteorological station, ornithological research, remote island, island

item.title: Spain wants own terminal in Gibraltar as part of cross-border transport hub proposals
item.description: Spain is exploring plans to build its own passenger terminal at Gibraltar airport as part of ambitious proposals for a cross-border transport hub.
item.author: Emily Wright
item.media:keywords: Gibraltar, Spain, Airports, Infrastructure, Gibraltar Airport, Cross-border transport hub, Post-Brexit arrangements, la linea, spanish border town, terminal facilities, border controls, single integrated facility, airport's dynamics, A-7 motorway

media:content.media:description: Spain is exploring plans to build its own passenger terminal at Gibraltar airport.

media:thumbnail.media:description: Spain is exploring plans to build its own passenger terminal at Gibraltar airport.

item.title: Russia accuses UK of wild neo-Nazi conspiracy theory
item.description: The Kremlin has seized on reports the new head of MI6's grandfather was a Nazi spy chief.
item.author: Jon King
item.media:keywords: Russia, Vladimir Putin, MI6, Russia nazi conspiracy theory, Blaise Metreweli Nazi grandfather, Blaise Metreweli,

media:content.media:description: A Russian minister thinks the UK is part of neo-Nazi conspiracy

item.title: Boeing plane crashes into Airbus on runway sparking travel chaos and pilot suspensions
item.description: Four pilots have been suspended after a jet cut the tail of another aircraft during a horror collision as 380 passengers watched on
item.author: Benjamin Lynch,Emily Wright
item.media:keywords: Aircraft, Airports, Air India plane crash, Boeing-Airbus collision, Vietnam Airlines, Noi Bai International Airport, Civil Aviation Authority of Vietnam, Civil Aviation Authority of Vietnam (CAAV), Boeing 787, Airbus A321, Level B incident, seat 11A

media:content.media:description: IMAGE TAKEN FROM XFahad Naim@Fahadnaimb·Jun 27Two Vietnam Airlines jets collided on a taxiway at Hanoi’s Noi Bai Airport Friday 27Jun. No injuries reported. Investigation underway.

media:thumbnail.media:description: IMAGE TAKEN FROM XFahad Naim@Fahadnaimb·Jun 27Two Vietnam Airlines jets collided on a taxiway at Hanoi’s Noi Bai Airport Friday 27Jun. No injuries reported. Investigation underway.

item.title: Russian economy quagmire as key exports and imports slump
item.description: A key part of the country's trading sector has seen a decline, according to new data.
item.author: Adam Toms

item.title: Huge 'city-killer' asteroid could hit the Moon in 2032 and spark 'massive consequences'
item.description: NASA has said the 10-storey YR4 asteroid could hit the Moon in 2032, sparking global communication chaos.
item.author: Emily Wright,Ryan Fahey
item.media:keywords: Space, Moon, International Space Station (ISS), NASA, Asteroid 2024 YR4, Moon impact, Satellite risk, Global connectivity disruption, 10-storey, 4.3% chance, atomic bomb, satellite systems, navigation systems, financial markets, military operations

media:content.media:description: NASA has said a huge asteroid could hit the Moon in 2032, sparking global communication chaos.

media:thumbnail.media:description: NASA has said a huge asteroid could hit the Moon in 2032, sparking global communication chaos.

item.title: Furious 700 protesters attack Jeff Bezos wedding with anti-fascist songs
item.description: More than 700 furious protesters sang anti-fascist songs during the latest demonstrations to hit Venice after Jeff Bezos and Lauren Sanchez's tied the knot.
item.author: Jon King
item.media:keywords: Venice, Jeffrey Bezos, Protests, Italy, Jeff Bezos, Jeff Bezos news, Jeff Bezos latest, Jeff Bezos wedding, Lauren Sanchez, Lauren Sanchez Bezos, Venice protests,

item.title: Donald Trump claims he saved Iran's Ali Khamenei from an 'ugly' death
item.description: Donald Trump has said he saved Iran's Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei from "a very ugly" death.

item.title: Holiday hotspots roast as first heatwave of the summer to bring 42C temperatures
item.description: Europe is on high alert for intense weather with the mercury to soar above 40C.
item.author: Lauran O'Toole
item.media:keywords: Heatwave, Mediterranean, Southern Europe, Health warnings, North Africa hot air, europe heatwave, europe weather, spain heatwave, italy heatwave, uk weather, uk heatwave

media:content.media:description: Europe is roasting under an extreme heatwave

item.title: Seaside city strangled by heatwave issues orange alert as 1 thing declared free
item.description: Health and fire warnings have been issued in countries across southern Europe, and in one French seaside city, swimming pools have been opened free of charge.
item.author: Emily Wright
item.media:keywords: Heatwave, Europe, France, Spain, Venice, Weather maps, Southern Europe, Free swimming pools, Wildfires, Health and fire warnings, hot air, north africa, Orange heat alerts, municipal swimming pools opened, Basse Durance hills, alexandra gary, spain

media:content.media:description: In one French seaside city, swimming pools have been opened free of charge during the heatwave.

media:thumbnail.media:description: In one French seaside city, swimming pools have been opened free of charge during the heatwave.
